card.name: Pegasus, Artist of Monsters
card.text: When Pegasus enters or attacks, create a token copy of a target creature an opponent controls, except it is an Illusion in addition to its other types. It has base power and toughness 2/2, and it gains "This creature can't be blocked except by Illusions." Whenever one or more Illusion creatures deal combat damage to a player, draw a card, then fateseal X, where X is the number of Illusion creatures that dealt damage to that player. (To fateseal X, look at the top X cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Jeanne d'Arc Alter
card.text: Vigilance, Menace Dragons you control have Lifelink {T}: Jenne d'Arc Alter deals X damage to any target where X is the number of Dragons you control. You may look at the top X cards of your library and reveal a Dragon card from among them. Exile it. You may cast the exiled card by paying life equal to its mana value rather than pay its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Elysia, Herrscher of Human: Ego
card.text: Defender, Indestructible Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent may draw a card. For each opponent who does, create a Treasure token and put an Ego counter on Elysia, Herrscher of Human: Ego. At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player may draw a card. If they do, you and that player create a Treasure token and put an Ego counter on Elysia, Herrscher of Human: Ego. Remove thirteen Ego counters from Elysia, Herrscher of Human: Ego: Each player may shuffle his or her hand into their library and draw seven cards.

card.name: Frieren, The Last Great Mage
card.text: Vigilance At the start of your end phase, Frieren explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back on top or into your graveyard.) If you have full party, target Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard each explore instead. {T}: The next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs X less to cast where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Frieren.

card.name: Gore Magala, Dark Eclipse
card.text: Flying When Gore Magala enters the battlefield or deals combat damage, create up to one aura enchantment token named Frenzy Virus attached to a target creature other than Gore Magala or Shagaru Magala. When Gore Magala enters the battlefield or attacks, if you control five or more Frenzy Virus tokens, transform Gore Magala.

card.name: Makima, Executive Control
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a creature {T}: Put a contract counter on target nontoken creature. When a creature with a contract counter dies, its controller draws a card. Then, create a token copy of it under your control.

card.name: Shagaru Magala, Bright Eclipse
card.text: Flying When Shagaru Magala deals combat damage, create up to two aura enchantment token named Frenzy Virus attached to two different target creatures other than Gore Magala or Shagaru Magala. Shagaru Magala gets +1/+0 for each Frenzy Virus token you control.

card.name: The Warden
card.text: Equipment you control has Shackle X, where X is equal to its equip cost. (Attach to target creature an opponent controls. Shackle only as a sorcery.) {2},{T}: Create a colorless Equipment Artifact token named Wrath with "Equipped creature has persist and is goaded" and equip {2}.

card.name: Cruz Silva, Queen of the Lost
card.text: Lifelink Whenever you pay life, create X blood tokens, where X is the amount of life you paid. {2}{U},{T}: Blood tokens you control become 2/1 vampire horror creatures with lifelink in addition to their other types. Sacrifice all blood tokens you control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Rex, Journeying to Elysium
card.text: Partner with Pyra, Flaming Aegis LEVEL 1 3/2 {2},{T}: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. LEVEL 2-3 4/3 When this creature attacks, you may target one equipment artifact defending player controls. Pay X, where X is equal to its mana value: Create a token copy of that artifact and attach it to Rex. LEVEL 4+ 5/4 Gain an emblem that has "At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control a creature named Rex, Journeying to Elysium and a creature named Pyra, Flaming Aegis or Mythra, Aegis Unbound, exile them, then meld them into Rex and Pneuma, Embodiment of Elysium."

card.name: Pyra, Flaming Aegis
card.text: Partner with Rex, Journeying to Elysium When Pyra attacks, deal 1 damage to target creature the defending player controls. If a creature named Rex is also attacking that player, repeat it, then place an affinity counter on Pyra. {W},{T}, remove 3 affinity counters from Pyra: You gain an emblem that has “You may pay {2}: Flip Pyra, Flaming Aegis or Mythra, Aegis Unbound. You may do this only once per turn and only as a sorcery.” (Melds with Rex, Journeying to Elysium.)

card.name: Mythra, Aegis Unbound
card.text: First strike At the beginning of your end step, if Mythra and a creature named Rex, Journeying to Elysium you control both attacked the same player this turn, put a level counter on that creature. (Melds with Rex, Journeying to Elysium.)

card.name: Rex and Pneuma, Embodiment of Elysium
card.text: Haste, double strike When Rex and Pneuma enter, attach any number of equipment you control to them. When Rex and Pneuma attack, you may cast target equipment artifact from your graveyard. You may attach it to Rex and Pneuma. When Rex and Pneuma attack, you may pay {2}. If you do, exile up to one target equipment defending player controls, then return it to the battlefield under your control. You may attach it to Rex and Pneuma. Then deal X damage to each creature defending player controls, where X is equal to the number of equipment attached to Rex and Pneuma.

card.name: Frenzy Virus
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has +1/+0 and must attack each combat if able. When enchanted creature deals combat damage, create a copy of this token attached to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Wrath
card.text: Equipped creature has persist and is goaded. Equip {2}

card.name: Pyra, Flaming Aegis Emblem
card.text: You may pay {2}: Flip Pyra, Flaming Aegis or Mythra, Aegis Unbound. You may do this only once per turn and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Rex, Journeying to Elysium Emblem
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control a creature named Rex, Journeying to Elysium and a creature named Pyra, Flaming Aegis or Mythra, Aegis Unbound, exile them, then meld them into Rex and Pneuma, Embodiment of Elysium.
